channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260107)
item.description:
What's New

feat: detect Terminal panels in VSCode/Cursor and improve overlay detection

  • Add Terminal detection via AX Description attribute for integrated

terminals in VSCode, Cursor, and similar editors

  • Terminal panels now use slow injection method like native terminals
  • Fix false positive overlay detection when browser is focused but

Spotlight/Raycast window is visible in background

  • Add AX RoleDescription, Description, and Placeholder display in Debug
  • Improve App Detector test button UX with computed properties
  • Update version to 20260107

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
